name: David Letterman
monologue: Paris Hilton was arrested again. Your move, Lindsay Lohan.

name: David Letterman
monologue: Top Ten Reasons I Still Love Hosting The Late Show With David Letterman

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Paris Hilton was arrested for cocaine possession. In her defense, it was in Las Vegas.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Paris says someone else left their cocaine in her purse. In legal circles, this is known as the Lindsay Lohan defense.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: From now on, when a joke bombs on this show, I’m going to say it was someone else’s joke.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: I went on vacation the same time as President Obama. We both had to get away from it all and not do anything of significance.
